examples.example: 他把甘蔗砍成了一截一截的，准备分给大家品尝。

translate.english: He chopped the sugarcane into sections and prepared to share it with everyone to taste.

examples.example: 我在路上捡到了一截铅笔，想着可以用来做些简单的记录。

translate.english: I picked up a piece of pencil on the road, thinking that it could be used to make some simple records.

examples.example: 他拿着一截粉笔在黑板上写下了漂亮的板书。

translate.english: He held a piece of chalk and wrote beautiful blackboard writing on the blackboard.
